Why does red mean stop and green mean go and yellow Means slow? Why should we slow the flow of the tide in our own minds? These are the questions we ask when there is noting left to ask when the life of the day Is fading away of our own philosophical minds. What do we do when the we cant fight the tyrants with tears controlling our fears? Left, right, and center, we are no longer together. These questions I ask, the questions I need, the answers I seek. The question you know the answer I need.
